mapper.select: select c.id, t.name 'taskInfo.name', t.`sponsor.id` 'taskInfo.sponsor.id', t.`start` 'taskInfo.start', t.`end` 'taskInfo.end', t.`sponsor.type` 'taskInfo.sponsor.type', t.`room.id` 'taskInfo.room.id', t.type 'taskInfo.type' from tb_completion c,tb_taskinfo t where t.`checker.id`=#{checker_id} and t.`checker.type`=#{checker_type} and t.id = c.`taskinfo.id` and (#{time} between t.start and t.end) and t.type=#{type} and #{date}=c.date and c.state=0 ;
mapper.update: update tb_completion set state=#{state}, update_time=now() where id=#{id};
